entry.title: SF proposal: prohibit unspendable outputs with amount=0
entry.summary: The context revolves around the creation of 0-value outputs that are spendable and can potentially stay in the utxo forever. The author suggests that requiring at least 1 satoshi per output would be slightly better than the current situation in combating a spam attack to the utxo. However, the author questions the necessity or use case of allowing spendable outputs with null amounts in them.The author proposes to create a BIP with its code if there is no reason or use case to allow spendable outputs with null amounts.
